channel.title: Testscape help pl0x
channel.description:
i really dont get how to start the server...I downloaded testscape source. Used WinRAR to extract it to my desktop. I clicked on the folder and looked for one of those icons with the gear on it(since mopar is like that). I found 2. 1 was called"compile" and the other "runserver". I clicked on compile and this is wut it said:'javac'is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .
WTF? now i clicked on runserver...It said starting testscape on * port number i think*
WTF once more?? :eek: someone plx tell me how to get it up and going like all the rest of the servers i join. *also i want my friends to be able to join* *also also is there spawning for all on testscape source?*

item.title: Testscape help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @strifer strifer
item.description:
@strifer wrote:

can someone tell me hwo to do in basic steps? o.O

Read full topic

item.title: Testscape help pl0x
item.dc:creator: @Darth_Vader Darth Vader
item.description:
@Darth_Vader wrote:

  1. right click edit compile.bat
  2. delete all that is in there
  3. paste this in:
    @echo off
    title SERVER NAME HERE
    javac -Xlint:deprecation *.java
    pause
  4. that should work

Read full topic
